name: One Whisp
description:
Can hope really win, even in the darkest moments of your life?

Explore the 3D world of One Whisp as a whimsical unnamed 2D character who loves to skate, take Candy, and has a somewhat pessimistic outlook on life. Walk around and interact with characters and objects in the world to experience the story (and hopefully, get to the good ending!).

(The game is full of bugs, so if you happened to leave the bounds of the game or you find yourself not being able to click anything anymore, just restart the game, im sorry :( )

Credits:
